attributes.action: Prohibiting the resale of gaming consoles within 6 months from launch.
attributes.additional_details:
The current situation at the gaming consoles market in UK affects hundred thousands of people.
Stopping so called scslpers from taking advantage of this situation by manipulating home entertainment market is the right thing to do especially during challenging times of covid lockdown.
attributes.background: Prohibiting the resale of gaming consoles and computer components at prices greatly above Manufacturer's Recommended Retail Price within 6 month from launch.
